entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
